title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The global empathy crisis that confronts us this Christmas
items.description: Empathy levels diminished 14% across the U.S. after the pandemic, with the steepest drop among millennials, according to a United Way survey.

items.title: Telluride resort owner rips into ski patrol union after strikes shuts down slopes on Christmas
